updateOrder: update crs_order.order_info set order_status = 0,order_info_hotel_keeper_status = 3,order_info_consumer_status = 1,pay_status =1 where order_no = '$orderNo$';update crs_order.order_info_room set order_room_hotel_keeper_status = 0 where order_no = '$orderNo$'
updateLinkOrder: update crs_order.order_info set order_status = 0,order_info_hotel_keeper_status = 3,order_info_consumer_status = 1,pay_status =1 where order_no = '$linkOrderNo$';update crs_order.order_info_room set order_room_hotel_keeper_status = 0 where order_no = '$linkOrderNo$'
